Plot: Hamilton captures the edgy, obsessive and eventually murderous mindset of a romantically frustrated British man in this WWII-era novel. London 1939, and in the grimy publands of Earls Court, George Harvey Bone is pursuing a helpless infatuation with Netta who is cool, contemptuous and hopelessly desirable to George. George is adrift in hell, until something goes click in his head and he realizes that he must kill her.
Characters: George Harvey Bone, Netta Longdon, Peter (Hangover Square), Mickey (Hangover Square), Johnnie Littlejohn, Eddie Carstairs
Setting: London, England (United Kingdom), Brighton, England (United Kingdom)
